author: Maureen Dowd
message: The minute you settle for less than you deserve, you get even less than you settled for.
title: Thought of the day

author: Charles Darwin
message: The highest stage in moral ure at which we can arrive is when we recognize that we ought to control our thoughts.
title: Thought of the day

message: It is better to take many small steps in the right direction than to make a great leap forward only to stumble backward.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: If we have a positive mental attitude, then even when surrounded by hostility, we shall not lack inner peace.
title: Thought of the day
